instructions: ## General Check out the [official website](https://www.mannifest-games.com/games/noreturn/) to get the latest rulebooks and helpful tools. ## Handling * With the button "Fuer alle wuerfeln" or "Fuer GM wuerfeln" it is possible to switch the visible no for all dice that are rolled over the character sheet. ## Contact If you find bugs or have suggestions, please use the [Github issue tracker](https://github.com/Tealk/roll20-character-sheets/issues) for this sheet. ## Contribute If you want to support me, here is my [Roll20 wish list](https://app.roll20.net/wishlist/53252).
